preferResultExternalId

public void preferResultExternalId(java.lang.String preferredExternalId)
                            throws GnException
Specifies preference for results that contain the provided external identifier

Remarks:

This option is currently only supported when online processing is enabled and single result is specified.

Parameters:
preferredExternalId - [in] The name of an external identifier that should be preferred when selecting matches
Throws:
GnException

Parameters:
bEnable - [in] Set prefer cover art.
Throws:
GnException

resultSingle

public void resultSingle(boolean bEnable)
                  throws GnException
Specifies whether a response must return only the single best result. When enabled a single full result is returned, when disabled multiple partial results may be returned.

Parameters:
bEnable - [in] Option, default is true. True to enable, false to disable.
Throws:
GnException

resultRangeStart

public void resultRangeStart(long resultStart)
                      throws GnException
Specifies whether a response must return a range of results that begin at the specified values

Parameters:
resultStart - [in] Result range start value

Remarks:

This Option is useful for paging through results.

Note:

Gracenote Service enforces that the range start value must be less than or equal to the total number of results. If you specify a range start value that is greater than the total number of results, no results are returned.
Throws:
GnException

resultCount

public void resultCount(long resultCount)
                 throws GnException
Specifies the number of results to return in the response

Parameters:
resultCount - [in] Number of results
Throws:
GnException

networkInterface

public void networkInterface(java.lang.String intfName)
                      throws GnException
Set a specific network interface to use with this object's connections. This can be useful for systems with multiple network interaces. Otherwise, the operating system determines the interface to use.

Parameters:
intfName - [in] Local IP address or system name for the desired network interface
Throws:
GnException

networkInterface

public java.lang.String networkInterface()
                                  throws GnException
Return network interface being use with this object's connections if one has been set. If no specific network interface has been set this option will return an empty string.

Throws:
GnException
